Uses of Interface
modelisation.Effect

  • Uses of Effect in modelisation

    Classes in modelisation that implement Effect
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Effect_Aoe
    An area-of-effect attack that damages every enemy in the combat.
    class 
    Effect_Atteck
    An attack effect.
    class 
    Effect_Backfire
    A risky effect that damages the enemy and also hurts the hero.
    class 
    Effect_Charge
    A mana-recovery effect.
    class 
    Effect_Def
    A defensive effect that increases the hero's block for the current turn.
    class 
    Effect_Heal
    A healing effect that restores health points to the hero.
    class 
    Effect_Lifesteal
    An attack effect that also heals the hero by the dealt amount.
    class 
    Effect_Puncture
    A chained attack effect.
